content:
# The attempt to insert 10 iron ore into the furnace has failed again, as my inventory remains unchanged and still shows the same 10 iron ore. 
# 
# The furnace is currently working and has 15 iron ore available, indicating that it can accept more ore, but my previous command to insert iron ore did not register correctly.
# 
# To resolve this, I will need to check the furnace's status and ensure that I can insert the iron ore correctly. 

# Let's inspect the furnace's inventory and status again to understand the situation better.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Checking the furnace's inventory.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory and its status.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the current state of entities on the map.
